column4: does ubuntu 8.10 desktop edition currently utilize dual cores properly without the need of extra packages?
im using a HP with Athlon X2 its seems to utilize it right
it also lists each core in the process window and i can be converting videos into ogg format at 100% on one core and browsing the web on the other
thanks for replies. i'm currently running on a dual core as well and I see 145% CPU usage so I'm guessing that both most be working. Just wanted to make sure.
